game.s_dis: VEX 6 is a parkour-platformer where you jump, slide, and navigate stickman through challenging acts while collecting coins and unlocking skins.
game.l_dis:
VEX 6 ‚Äì Stickman Parkour Challenge

VEX 6 is the latest entry in the popular stickman parkour series. Jump, slide, and run through 9 new Acts + 9 Hard Acts, completing 'Vexation' final stages and collecting coins along the way.

What is VEX 6?

VEX 6 challenges your timing, reflexes, and precision as a stickman navigating increasingly difficult obstacles. The game features high-resolution graphics at 60fps, daily tasks, bonus levels, and a total of 64 unlockable stickman skins.

How to Play VEX 6?

  • Jump & Slide: Navigate through platforms, spikes, and traps.
  • Complete Acts: Finish standard and hard acts to progress.
  • Collect Coins: Unlock skins and power-ups by gathering coins.
  • Daily Tasks: Play every day to complete bonus levels for extra rewards.
  • Vexation Stage: Finish each act with the final challenging stage.

Why Play VEX 6 Unblocked?

VEX 6 Unblocked allows you to enjoy fast-paced stickman parkour action anywhere, anytime, without downloads or restrictions in your browser.

Key Features

  • High-Resolution Graphics: Stunning visuals at 60fps for smooth gameplay.
  • Multiple Acts: 9 new Acts + 9 Hard Acts for extended play.
  • Unlockable Skins: Collect coins to unlock 64 different stickman appearances.
  • Daily Challenges: Complete bonus levels and earn rewards.
  • Unblocked Access: Play instantly in your browser.

The Ultimate Stickman Parkour
